proj_agustyle.title: Agustyle Barbershop System
proj_agustyle.description: System for managing online reservations, with online payments via MercadoPago, in a barbershop.
proj_agustyle.longDescription:
Agustyle barbershop streamlined its appointment booking process by implementing an online system. This user-friendly platform allows clients to effortlessly view available time slots, secure their appointments by registering through their Facebook or Google accounts, and make payments online using MercadoPago, simplifying the onboarding and payment process.
Key features include:
- Social Login: Quick and easy registration/login using Facebook or Google.
- Real-time Availability: Clients see up-to-date appointment slots.
- Online Payments: Secure payment integration with MercadoPago for reservations.
- Admin Management Panel: Administrators have full control to manage, modify, or cancel appointments as needed.
- Calendar Integration: Clients can add confirmed bookings as reminders to their personal calendars with a single click.
This digital solution has significantly improved scheduling consistency throughout the month, leading to a notable increase in reservations. It has optimized operational efficiency for the barbershop while enhancing the booking experience for its clientele.

proj_foodstore.title: Food Store System
proj_foodstore.description: Order management system, products, delivery drivers, and cash register, significantly improving each internal process of the company.
proj_foodstore.longDescription:
A comprehensive web system designed to revolutionize fast food preparation and delivery operations. The system caters to distinct roles for kitchen staff, delivery personnel, and administrators, ensuring a seamless workflow from order placement to final delivery.
Key features:
- Google Account Integration for customer registration.
- Online purchasing and real-time order tracking.
- Automated stock control.
- Customer engagement features like raffles.
- Geospatial order visualization for admins and delivery.
- Real-time delivery wallet and advanced reporting.
Following its success, a new client began using the system in 2023.

proj_portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio Website
proj_portfolio.description: The very portfolio you are looking at, built with Next.js and ShadCN UI.
proj_portfolio.longDescription:
This portfolio website, the very platform you are currently exploring, serves as a dynamic showcase of my skills, projects, and professional journey. It's meticulously built using cutting-edge technologies:
- Next.js 14 with App Router: For optimal performance, server-side rendering, and efficient routing.
- TypeScript: Ensuring type safety and maintainable code.
- Tailwind CSS: For a utility-first approach to styling, resulting in a clean and responsive design.
- ShadCN UI: Leveraging pre-built, accessible, and customizable React components.
- GenAI Integration: Features an AI-powered chatbot for interactive Q&A.
- i18n Support: Fully internationalized for English and Spanish users.
The design prioritizes a clean, modern aesthetic, intuitive navigation, and a seamless user experience across all devices. It aims to provide a comprehensive overview of my capabilities and how I approach software development.

proj_servitec.title: Servitec - Field Service Management
proj_servitec.description: System to record mechanic jobs, manage payments, schedule visits with notifications, and a landing page for company information.
proj_servitec.longDescription:
Servitec began as a system to record mechanic jobs in the field, aiming to maintain a history of completed work and manage payment for the services rendered.
The system includes an agenda feature that allows the administrator to schedule future visits, and it sends advance notifications to the administrator via push notifications, email, and WhatsApp messages.
To enhance web visibility, it has been decided to add a landing page that showcases information about the company and displays relevant photos of completed jobs. This addition will contribute to presenting a more professional and appealing image to potential clients visiting the website.

proj_work_hours.title: Work Hours - Field Staff Time Tracking
proj_work_hours.description: System for field staff to log working hours and vehicle usage, with real-time admin overview, statistics, and reporting.
proj_work_hours.longDescription: Work Hours is a comprehensive solution designed for companies with field staff. Employees can easily log their working hours and specify the vehicles used directly from their mobile devices using a React Native app. This data is synchronized in real-time with a Firebase backend. Administrators can access a web dashboard (built with Next.js) to monitor logged hours, view statistics, and generate reports, providing valuable insights into field operations and resource utilization.

agustin_ceballos.name: Agustin Ceballos
agustin_ceballos.feedback: My name is Agustín, and I work in men's aesthetics, specifically in hair and beard cutting. I've been in the field for about 5 years, and approximately 3 years ago, due to the pandemic, I was forced to organize my clientele. Until then, I worked on a first-come, first-served basis, often having 5 to 8 people waiting in the shop. I started using methods like WhatsApp reservations, but I still couldn't find a solution for order and efficiency, as I had to be attentive to the phone while serving clients. Thanks to Brian Bentancourt, I found the solution to my problem. He designed a web scheduling application through which clients can book themselves, allowing me to work peacefully without being tied to the phone. Today, a little over a year after the pandemic, I continue to work the same way, as the web application was very well received by clients and proved to be a solution for me, also being an innovation in my field.

bruno_fiorelli.name: Bruno Fiorelli
bruno_fiorelli.feedback: As a review of the service Brian provides, I must say that in our case he managed a program that optimized our work and customer service. We improved in several areas thanks to the system! Brian's personal attention was always excellent too, solving doubts or correcting details as quickly as possible.

sebastian_fagundez.name: Sebastián Fagúndez
sebastian_fagundez.feedback: Having hired Brian's services has given us the ability to capture sales and manage our orders in the best possible way. We acquired these services at a difficult time for our company, where we managed them manually and archaically, leading to absurd delays, which clearly made us lose more customers. Thanks to the implementation of an IT system, extremely easy to use and with all the features we needed, today we manage our orders efficiently, obtaining better results and therefore more customers. I recommend everyone to hire Brian Bentancourt's services, excellent quality, professionalism, and a fair price!
